history.narrative: Law 7-2 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-126. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 17, 1987 and March 3, 1987, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 19, 1987, it was assigned Act No. 7-6 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
